name: Ninja Runner (FALKon2246)
description:
Movement

A,D or <,> - Left and Right
W or SPACE or ^ - Jump
SHIFT - Sprint

Wall Slide and Jump

While holding down the direction of the wall in the air, you will perform a wall slide.
After that, just jump to perform a Wall Jump!


Note: holding shift when about to wall jump will launch you further out, but not as high, whereas not holding shift will keep you closer to the wall while gaining more height.

Levels:

Level 1: Great Start
Level 2: Hop, Skip, and a Jump
Level 3: Moving On
Level 4: Approaching New Heights
Level 5: Sticky Walls
Level 6: By the Skin of Our Teeth
Level 7: Convenient
Level 8: Sky-High
Level 9: Hippity-Hop
Level 10: Easy?
BONUS Level: Sharp as a Needle

Note: To unlock the BONUS level, you have to get a three-star rating after completing a run (getting 10 or fewer deaths)

P.S. The "Exit" button in the title screen won't work when playing on the browser, and only would once download.
